description: Individual written assessment proposing a study addressing a research question, including rationale, methodology, analysis plans, predicted outcomes, and limitations (1500 words).
Individual participation in weekly tutor-led group activities (8%), online tutorial activities (3%), and self-test quizzes (4%) to complement course content.
Individual exam testing knowledge of lectures, online activities, readings, and tutorials via multiple choice, fill-in-the-blank, and short essay questions.
Group presentation (10 minutes + 5-minute Q&A) detailing a research question, proposed study rationale, hypotheses, methodology, and planned analyses. Includes peer evaluations.
